abstract: Editorial holds that the makeup of the United States Supreme Court may well be the most important issue of the 2012 presidential race, and one that is not being truly addressed by any of the Republican presidential hopefuls.
snippet: The makeup of the Supreme Court is an important issue in the presidential race, and it is not being truly addressed.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)

lead_paragraph: The makeup of the Supreme Court is an important issue in the presidential race, and it is not being truly addressed.

headline.main: The Court and the Next President
headline.print_headline: The Court and the Next President
headline.seo: The Supreme Court and the Next President
